action.text: SA 3849 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell when cloture was invoked on the motion to concur in the House amendment to S. 1301 with an amendment (SA 3847).
Amendment SA 3849 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S6954; text: CR S6954) To change the effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3849 proposed by Senator Schumer.
